## Description {#details}

Identifies a unique instance of a variable.

Storage for identifying a potentially inlined instance of a variable, or a fragment thereof. This guarantees that exactly one variable instance may be identified by this class, even when that variable is a fragment of an aggregate variable and/or there is another inlined instance of the same source code variable nearby. This class does not necessarily uniquely identify that variable: it is possible that a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> with different parameters may point to the same variable instance, but not that one <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> points to multiple variable instances.

Definition at line 4024 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
